description: Identifies IPs performing DNS lookups associated with common Tor proxies.
name: DNS TOR Proxies
query: (event.dataset:"dns" AND dns.question.name.text:("tor2web.org" OR "tor2web.com" OR "torlink.co" OR "onion.to" OR "onion.ink" OR "onion.cab" OR "onion.nu" OR "onion.link" OR "onion.it" OR "onion.city" OR "onion.direct" OR "onion.top" OR "onion.casa" OR "onion.plus" OR "onion.rip" OR "onion.dog" OR "tor2web.fi" OR "tor2web.blutmagie.de" OR "onion.sh" OR "onion.lu" OR "onion.pet" OR "t2w.pw" OR "tor2web.ae.org" OR "tor2web.io" OR "tor2web.xyz" OR "onion.lt" OR "s1.tor\-gateways.de" OR "s2.tor\-gateways.de" OR "s3.tor\-gateways.de" OR "s4.tor\-gateways.de" OR "s5.tor\-gateways.de" OR "hiddenservice.net"))
author: Saw Winn Naung
Azure-Sentinel
